data.title: Discover music on NTS
data.meta_description:
Michael Gray has been played on NTS in shows including Beauty Blender w/ A.G & Manara, featured first on 15 October 2019. Songs played include Stop Bajon (Michael Gray Remix) , The Weekend (Radio Edit) and The Weekend.

British house producer Michael Gray strolls into the summer with his new single ‘Walk Into The Sun’ on Electrik Funk. He revisits the track after it featured on his 2007 ‘Analogue Is On’ artist album originally only available in Japan that due to contractual reasons never received a full release.

You can see why Michael wanted to revisit this gem when you hear Steve Edwards (Dirty Vegas), Shena,...
data.text:
Michael Gray has been played on NTS in shows including Beauty Blender w/ A.G & Manara, featured first on 15 October 2019. Songs played include Stop Bajon (Michael Gray Remix) , The Weekend (Radio Edit) and The Weekend.

British house producer Michael Gray strolls into the summer with his new single ‘Walk Into The Sun’ on Electrik Funk. He revisits the track after it featured on his 2007 ‘Analogue Is On’ artist album originally only available in Japan that due to contractual reasons never received a full release.

You can see why Michael wanted to revisit this gem when you hear Steve Edwards (Dirty Vegas), Shena,…
